title: Color by Y-Value
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library in Python. It is a powerful tool for creating a wide range of graphs and charts. One of the features of Matplotlib is the ability to plot lines with different colors based on the y-value. This lab will demonstrate how to use masked arrays to plot a line with different colors by y-value.
